12.title: Eric's fc's

122.content:
Continue
Let's get this party started.
Bang, click, and screams of joy filled the room of the household. Eric and his friends were having a good time celebrating the defeat of Eggman once more. However, they would soon find out that this day isn't quite a normal day.
Eric was with Frost like usual and everyone else was doing there own thing. However something felt off that day. Normally they wold celebrate and live in the land of peace for awhile but something didn't feel right.
Eric: (drinking his soft drink) Hey, Frost.
Frost: What's up?
Eric: Not much, but have you ever got the feeling like you were being watched.
Frost: I get that all of the time but that's what living on the street will do to you. Why is someone watching?
Eric: Hmm, good point, but something isn't right.

What happens next?

1523211.content:
I like these ideas but some of the are a little complicated but I have chosen some characters that I find rather interesting. (Note: I don't take credit for making any of these characters)
Eve, Omega, Kit Dramon, and Robomon.
http://www.writing.com/main/view_item/it...
The original descriptions are in the link but here are the general descriptions of them
Eve:
Abilities: Reality jumping fighter (as defined as being able to travel through dimensions)
Appearance: Wears khaki pants, a long sleeved shirt, and has brown hair. Body is curvy but wasn't always
Personality: Energetic, caring, lazy (at times), can be stubborn, but has a heart of gold.
Interests: Animal lover, Likes to play pranks occasionally, and likes to use her powers.

Omega:
Abilities: (similiar to Eve's but darker) Has claws sharp enough to cut through steel. Armored fur.
Appearance: She wears a top hat and a sleeveless jacket while wearing jeans(Human Form) Her Monster Form looks humanoid, but doesn't have a shred of human blood in her. Standing at 10ft(Minimum) to 150ft(Maximum), she wears a hat similar to Koishi's, but with a dark-red texture. Her claws are long and sharp. (various animals) Scary eyes said to look into one's soul. Sharp serrated teeth.
Personality: (Old style) Wise but humorous. Can get vicious especially when hungry.
Interests: None known. Said to be quite a jokester.

This is a lot to take in so I made this biography into several parts.

What happens next?
1523211.title: Let's begin!

15232111.content:
Continue
Warning: (after this biography the story will start)
Kit Dramon:
Personality: Likes to joke around a lot, a little mischevious but has a big heart. (especially to those that are in need)
Abilities: Fire based attacks, special punches, can fly and cut, can disguise herself (limited), can create shields (not very long), and summoning. (only uses when available)
Interests: Pranking, joking, weapons, and magic
Appearance: (varies) Default form: Baby fox with dragon wings.

Lastly from this fan
Robomon:
Appearance: Looks like a harmless old-fashioned toy robot.
Abilities: Shoots laser, musical based attacks, and speed.
Personality: Robot but does have feelings.
Interests: Computing and fighting,

Now some of mine

Miley:
Appearance:Wears a yellow short-sleeved dress
Abilities: force, Possible future teller (said to read minds), teleporting and healing.
Personality: Cheery and compassionate to everyone. Patient when irritated.
Interests: Reading, ancient mythology, and studying the unknown

Scott:
Appearance: Black and white (looks a lot like Tails)
Abilities: (similiar to Miley's) Force, can turn invisible, energy absorption, levitation and form chaanger
Personality: Likes to be alone, friendly, skeptical around other, can be aggressive and spontaneously unpredictable.
Interests: None known. (No one knows because he is rarely seen)

What happens next?
15232111.title: Part 2

choices: A girl wearing khaki pants, a long sleeved shirt, and has brown hair.
152321111.content:
"Go, are you okay?", a 16 year-old red-haired woman wearing a red and white uniform asked her 17 year-old black-haired fellow pilot after a disastrous attempt to form a robot known as Neo Getter Robo. These two were Shou Tachibana(The girl and the pilot of Unit-2) and Go Ichimonji(The boy and the pilot of Unit-1).

Suddenly, a helmet flew between the two of them. They turned to see a man known as Yamagishi stomping towards them. "Go, what the hell was THAT? Are you trying to get me KILLED!?", Yamagishi yelled. "What are you talking about?", Go asked. "Don't play dumb!! The combination timing was off by .024 seconds!", he angrily told Go. "What makes you think it was my fault?", Go calmly asked him. "Who else could it have been?!", he retorted. "According to my calculations, Unit-3 was off by .024 seconds." "What did you just say?!", Yamagishi furiously said, before he quickly picked Go up by his collar. "Are you trying to blame me!?", Yamagishi yelled at him. "Go!", Shou said.

"Lieutenant Yamagashi!!"

The three turned their heads to see a large muscular man wearing a mechanic's uniform. This man is Gai Daido. "Could you two get out of the way? I have to repair the damage you guys did to Unit-3.", Gai asked Go and Yamagishi, who released his hold on Go almost as quickly when he grabbed him.

"Go and Shou to Commander Jin's office.", an intercom said. "What could he want with us at a time like this?", Shou thought.


(Sometime later...)

"A rift?", Go curiously repeated after his commander told him about a rift that is causing panic. In front of him sat a man that if you looked straight in the eyes, you'd see death and wisdom in them. This is Jin Hayato, former pilot of Getter-2. Jin nodded. "Yes, a rift in time and space, to be exact." "So, anything could come out of this 'rift'.", Shou said to Jin. "Exactly. Thus, you'll go to this spot.", Jin said as he told the duo what to do. "Can we bring the Getter?", Go asked. Jin looked at him. "Uh, in case something happens, Sir.", Go quickly added after Jin's cold stare reached his eyes. ".......Very well." Go & Shou were about to leave Jin's office when he said "One more thing." The two turned to face him. "What else could want us to know?" "Yamagishi will not join you for missions anymore."

"What?!", Go and Shou nearly shouted. Although the two hated him, they wondered why he won't join them for missions. Jin raised his hand to silence the two. "Yamagishi is emotionally unstable. Therefore, he was honorably discharged and a Mr. Gai Daido will be the pilot of Unit-3 now." Seeing their shocked faces, he added "While he has failed the Intelligence and Speed Tests, Gai got a perfect on the Power." Jin sighed. "Besides, his heart is in the right place, and that alone is good enough for me. You may leave." After Go and Shou left, he stood up and looked out the window. "Heh. A battle hungry kid, a sharp-minded girl, and a man with a big heart. Reminds me of the old days.{/}" Jin thought, reminiscing about fighting in Getter Robo.


(A few hours later)(Hey, fixing up a giant robot takes time!)

A giant robot was flying over Japan.
It was colored dark blue(Top half) and rad(Lower half). It also has finned blades on its forearms, along with a 'crown on its head. This is Neo Getter Robo.

"How does it feel, Gai?", Go asked through the interface. "How does what feel?" "Piloting your 'love', you idiot!" "Well, its like a dream come true."

*THUMP*

"Hey Gai, how much did you repair this thing?", Go asked, wondering if this would be his last flight. "Well, considering that some of the parts damaged are hard to find, I'd say I repaired about 85% of the damages. So, don't worry about being destroyed so easily!", Gai responded, getting teary-eyed about thinking of the damages done to his machine. "Target is in sight. Get ready, you two!", Shou said.

The trio saw with their own eyes a crack near a street. Although normal to have cracks in streets, what WASN'T normal about this one was the fact that it was in mid-air, almost as if someone cracked the air itself. People stood near it, wondering what the heck is it. "I'm getting weird energy readings from that hole, so say cautious!", Shou warned.

Suddenly, the crack widened and spat out.........
152321111.title: A Hero's Tale vs Shin Getter Robo

choices: A woman wearing a top hat, sleeveless jacket, & jeans(Omega)
A toy robot and a......Fox kit with wings?!(Robomon & Kit Dramon)
1523211112.content: Well, ya got two more choices
1523211112.title: someone else

15232111122.content: Sorry! Forgot about two others!
15232111122.title: Whoops!

choices: When they get back to the base with Robomon and KitDramon....
152321111221.content:
(30 seconds earlier...)

"Shou! Gai! Get ready for whatever comes out of that thing!" Go told his fellow pilots as the Neo Getter Robo entered a fighting stance. "When this thing comes out, we'll send it to Hell!", Go thought as he and his team waited for the thing coming out of the rift.

(Present time)

...A toy robot and a fox kit.
"You're kidding me.", Go said in disbelief at what he saw come from the wormhole. "A false alarm?", Shou asked. Go looked at the two things that came out of the wormhole and sighed "....Yeah." Jin appeared on the interface. "Report." "Well sir, turns out that it was-"

"Hey, Gigantor!"

The three followed the sound to see the fox kit....flying with dragon wings while holding the toy robot by its armpits! "What the hell?!" Go and Shou exclaimed at the sight. "Well, one of them at least knows how to speak.", Gai said optimistically. "I beg your pardon?", the toy robot asked. "You may want to scratch that statement, Gai.", said Go, still not believing the sight in front of him.

(Author's note: People will get confused and write something that doesn't makes sense. To combat this, I'm making a guideline of sorts so people will know who is who. With that out of the way....

Go Ichimonji=The pilot of Unit-1 (a.k.a, Neo Getter-1)
Shou Tachibana=The pilot of Unit-2 (a.k.a, Neo Getter-2)
Gai Daido=Mechanic/New Pilot for Unit-3 (a.k.a, Neo Getter-3)
Yamagishi=Former Pilot of Unit-3/Big Lipped Alligator Moment (He doesn't appear after he is decommissioned(it means that he was kicked out).
Jin Hayato=Former pilot of Getter-2, now Commander of NISAR (Meaning everyone answers to him.)
152321111221.title: Robomon and KitDramon

152321111222.content:
Continue
Scott and Miley meet Kit Dramon and Robomon.
The crack opened and spat out two strange looking creatures, at least to this planet. Both had black fur but one was a fox (Scott) and the other was a hedgehog. (Miley)
Shou didn't recognize what they were nor has seen anything like them. Gai and Jin went to check out the scene.
Gai: (walking over to the scene) Okay guys target in sight.
Shou: Wait don't shoot. It looks like some other life forms are here.
Jin: We need to file a report to Yamigashi.
Meanwhile while the three pilots were working, another portal opens up and two more creatures appear.

What happens next?

15232112211.content:
Here are my fan characters.

Doraemon: leader of the Doraemons and all around good guy. Home country: Japan.

Dora the kid: the second in command of the team, also a wild cowboy who's good at shooting but is quick tempered. Home country: U.S.A.

Wang Dora: the team's resident doctor and geek, also can be shy around females. Home country: China.

Dora-Nichov: a local citizen who lives in Moscow, also he can transform into a wolf if he sees a full moon. Home country: U.S.S.R

El-Matadora: lives in modern day Madrid Spain, Also he's quite a ladies cat and is the team's strongest member who sometimes doesn't get along with Wang Dora. Home country: Spain.

Dora Med III: a fortune teller who lives in the middle east and is afraid of water. Home country: Saudi Arabia.

Dora-Rinho: a world famous soccer player and can be quite eccentric. Home country: Brazil

JaiDora: a cook from Italy who can be overwhelmed at times. Home country: Italy.
15232112211.title: Your own Fan characters. (not vgm765's)

info.brief_description: Random spoofs of a show or a movie
info.description:
Well like many other stories this is a crossover story. However you can include your own character. Not much else so have at it.

Rules
1.) No cursing
2.) No sex or nudity of any kind
3.)No death of any main character even if they are your own.(Violence is allowed but keep it moderate)
3.) you may include your own characters but be as descriptive as possible. e.c. Miley is a female hedgehog that wears a yellow dress. She is a very cheery type of girl and her best friend is Scott. (you don't have to format it like this but please make at least three descriptive sentences)
4.) Have fun. (if you are not sure about something just ask me.
5.) Please don't make any over excessive options or you will ruin the story for everyone. Just keep it simple other stories will have other options.
